nodes.text: The Facility was the surface level of Vergesso Base, and contained the station's spaceport and related facilities. The surface of Vergesso Prime was covered in individual hangars protected by magnetic field projectors, and could accommodate starships up to the size of corvette and bulk freighters.

The Facility offered cargo processing, storage, and repair services. Rental of the hangars depended on the size of the starship berthed in them. Smaller vessels were usually charged 100 credits a day, larger vehicles 200 credits a day. Refuelling and restocking services were charged at 50 credits per crew member, multiplied by the number of days of consumables required.
